benchmark_details.name: RSBench
benchmark_details.overview: RSBench is a benchmark problem set designed specifically for LLM-based recommender systems, focusing on session-based recommendations and optimizing recommendation prompts.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate LLM-based evolutionary algorithms in the context of recommendation prompt optimization.

data.source: Real-world datasets including MovieLens-1M, Amazon Games, and Amazon Bundle.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated using performance indicators defined in the benchmark.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics correspond to better performance in recommendation systems.
